project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. It will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the user input mechanism to get city name
Format and display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
